title: WTB: Off-backs of Gandil and Griffith (batting)
author: helfrich91

posts.post_title: WTB: Off-backs of Gandil and Griffith (batting)
posts.post_content:
Hi all - I'm doing back runs on Gandil and Griffith (batting). As you can imagine, the off-backs are harder to locate.


I'd love to find graded versions of these guys in lower grades ("A" through 4), so if you have examples you're looking to sell please send them along.



Feel free to email me at [url]helfrich91@yahoo.com[/url] or shoot me a PM.


It's great to have the Net54 community in your corner for a project like this!


Best,
Todd Helfrich

posts.post_title: WTB: Off-backs of Gandil and Griffith (batting)
posts.post_content:
Just wanted to recirculate this. I'd love to find off-backs of Gandil and Griffith (batting).


Feel free to shoot me a PM or email if you have one that you'd consider selling.


Thank you!


Todd
